Text: bburan, can you please re-up this or seed it some more for a while?

Nevermind my previous comment. 

Anyone who wants this program, but is having problems getting it via Torrent, can download it right from the author's website - it's FREEWARE meaning there is no reason to "pirate" it. 

http://www.roland-illig.de/lang.delphi.nrg2iso.html

Download the contents of both of the links in the "English" section and stick them into the same folder. No crack or anything needed - like I said, this is FREEWARE.
